title: How to Stop Windows Auto Update in 2 Minutes
excerpt: Quick guide to disable automatic Windows updates.
content:
Here’s the full step-by-step tutorial. You’ll learn how to disable Windows auto updates using Settings and Group Policy Editor. Follow carefully…

  1. Open Settings.
  2. Go to Update & Security.
  3. Disable automatic updates.
